title: Ask HN: What is your “I don't care if this succeeds” project?
author: as89
story_text: One where you don't care if it makes money or gets a lot of attention, but you are working on it regardless. I don't think I mean private hobbies, exactly, but projects that could or will be shared with others - you just don't care about the outcome.

title.value: Ask HN: What is your “I don't care if this succeeds” project?

story_text.value: One where you don't care if it makes money or gets a lot of attention, but you are working on it regardless. I don't think I mean private hobbies, exactly, but projects that could or will be shared with others - you just don't care about the outcome.

localize.title: 问HN：你的 "我不在乎这件事是否成功 "的项目是什么？
問HN：你的 "我不在乎這件事是否成功 "的項目是什麼？
